items.name: UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Visibility: Given: the user is on a page where elements are expected to be visible: When: the user wants to click a specific element
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Dynamic ID: Given: the user is on a page with dynamic ID elements: When: the user wants to interact with Dynamic ID elements
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Inner Text: Given: the user is on a page where there is inner text: When: the user wants to validate the inner text of an element
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Hidden layers: Given: the user is on a page where elements are cached: When: the user wants to interact with a cached element
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Click: Given: the user is on a page where event based clicks do not work: When: the user does a physical mouse click
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Dynamic table: Given: the user is on a page with a dynamic table: When: the user wants to validate a specific set of data within the table
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Class attribute: Given: the user is on a page where elements are using classes: When: the user wants to interact with a specific element
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Animated elements: Given: the user is on a page where elements can become animated: When: an element is animated
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Delay: Given: the user is on a page where JavaScript processing on client side happens: When: the user triggers client side logic
UI Testing Playground: Scenario: Disabled Input: Given: the user is on a page where inputs can be disabled: When: the user wants to interact with a disabled input
